name: UNIMPLEMENTED
description: Should not be used.

name: ONE_TIME_DURATION
description: Ignores the regular length (delta-time) of the next note and overwrites it with the specified length.

name: PITCH_SLIDE
description: When length is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: EXPRESSION_FADE
description: When length is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: PAN
description: 64 is the center.

name: PAN_FADE
description: When length is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: VIBRATO
description: When rate is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: VIBRATO_DEPTH
description:
The most significant bit of the depth determines the amplitude range.
When it is 0, the range is up to about +/- 50 cents (amplitude is 15/256 compared with range type 1).
When it is 1, the range is up to about +/- 700 cents.

name: TREMOLO
description: When rate is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: PAN_LFO
description: When rate is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: LOOP_START
description: Remember the current offset as a loop point and increase the nesting level of the loop.

name: LOOP_UNTIL
longname: Return to Loop Point Up to N Times
description:
On the Nth repeat, this instruction will end the current loop by decrementing the nesting level of the loop. Otherwise, it will increment the loop counter and return to the loop point.
When times is 0, it will be translated to 256 times.

name: LOOP_AGAIN
description: This instruction will increment the loop counter.

name: RESET_VOICE_EFFECTS
description: Reset sound effects such as noise, frequency modulation, reverb, overlay voice and alternate voice.

name: SLUR_ON
description: This instruction will stop the regular key on and key off performance of the subsequent notes and update the pitch only.

name: NOISE_ON_DELAY_TOGGLE
longname: Turn On Noise and Toggle Noise On/Off after a Period of Time
description: When delay is 0, it will be translated to 257 ticks.

name: NOISE_DELAY_TOGGLE
longname: Toggle Noise On/Off after a Period of Time
description: When delay is 0, it will be translated to 257 ticks.

name: LEGATO_ON
description: This instruction will stop the regular key off performance of the subsequent notes.

name: PITCH_MOD_ON_DELAY_TOGGLE
longname: Turn On Frequency Modulation and Toggle Frequency Modulation On/Off after a Period of Time
description: When delay is 0, it will be translated to 257 ticks.

name: PITCH_MOD_DELAY_TOGGLE
longname: Toggle Frequency Modulation On/Off after a Period of Time
description: When delay is 0, it will be translated to 257 ticks.

name: PITCH_SIDE_CHAIN_ON
longname: Turn On Playback Rate Side Chain
description: Duplicate and use the playback frequency of the previous voice channel.

name: PITCH_SIDE_CHAIN_OFF
longname: Turn Off Playback Rate Side Chain

name: PITCH_TO_VOLUME_SIDE_CHAIN_ON
description: Multiply the playback frequency of the previous voice channel to the output volume. Lower pitch will make the volume smaller.

name: TUNING_ABS
description:
The pitch can be changed in the range of one octave above and below.
The amount is the multiplicand for the playback frequency, not a log-based parameter like cents. For example, when the amount is 127, the pitch will be multiplied by 127/128 (about +1 octave). Negative value will lower the pitch.

name: TUNING_REL
description: The amount will be added to the current tuning amount.

name: PORTAMENTO_ON
description: When speed is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: FIXED_DURATION
description: Ignore the regular length (delta-time) of subsequent notes and set to the fixed length. The length_to_add parameter will be added to the current length value. (the initial value is 0)

name: VIBRATO_DEPTH_FADE
description: When length is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: TREMOLO_DEPTH_FADE
description: When length is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: PAN_LFO_FADE
description: When length is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: UNIMPLEMENTED
description: Code-referenced to 0xA0. Should not be used.

name: UNIMPLEMENTED
description: Code-referenced to 0xA0. Should not be used.

description: Code-referenced to 0xA0. Should not be used.

description: Code-referenced to 0xA0. Should not be used.

description: Code-referenced to 0xA0. Should not be used.

name: UNIMPLEMENTED
description: Code-referenced to 0xA0. Should not be used.

name: UNIMPLEMENTED
description: Code-referenced to 0xA0. Should not be used.

name: UNIMPLEMENTED
description: Code-referenced to 0xA0. Should not be used.

name: TEMPO
description:
bpm = tempo / 214.998204 (approximate)
More strictly, bpm = 60.0 / (48 * (65536.0 / tempo) * (0x44E8 / (33868800.0 / 8)))
Note that this coefficient is different from other games with PlayStation AKAO.

name: TEMPO_FADE
description: When length is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: REVERB_DEPTH_FADE
description: When length is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: DRUM_ON_V1
description: The drum_map_offset is a relative offset pointing to the drum instrument map table, which determines the instrument for each keys.

name: UNCONDITIONAL_JUMP
description: This instruction can be used to make an infinite loop.

name: CPU_CONDITIONAL_JUMP
description: Jump if the condition variable matches condition. The value of the condition variable can be set from the game program.

name: LOOP_BRANCH
description: When times is 0, it will be translated to 256 times.

name: LOOP_BREAK
longname: Break the Loop on the Nth Repeat
description:
Unlike 0xF0, this instruction will end the current loop by decrementing the nesting level of the loop.
When times is 0, it will be translated to 256 times.

name: PROGCHANGE_NO_ATTACK
description: Unlike 0xA1, the sample before the loop point is replaced by a short, silence sample.

name: F3_FF7
description: There is no actual use in music.

name: OVERLAY_VOICE_ON
description:
Play the same melody by different instruments on two voice channels. A free voice channel is required to work. Note that the two channels share the playback rate, and the pitch is not calculated for each instruments.
Used in the song "Anxious Heart".

name: OVERLAY_VOLUME_BALANCE
description: When the balance is 0, the volume of the primary voice will be 100% (127/128) of original and that of the secondary voice will be 0%. 127 is the opposite.

name: OVERLAY_VOLUME_BALANCE_FADE
description: When length is 0, it will be translated to 256 ticks.

name: ALTERNATE_VOICE_ON
description:
This instruction allows subsequent notes to be played on two alternating channels. At the same time, the ADSR release rate will be set to the specified value. A free voice channel is required to work.
Check "Opening - Bombing Mission", "Tifa's Theme" and "Fortress of the Condor" for actual usage.

name: UNIMPLEMENTED
description: Code-referenced to 0xA0. Should not be used.

name: TIME_SIGNATURE
description: Note that two parameters can be 0. This pattern is used for initialization.
